channel.title: Pedro F. Proença
channel.description: Recent content on Pedro F. Proença

item.description: Computer vision wizard and surfer from Portugal. I am currently working as a postdoc at NASA JPL with the Robotic Aerial Mobility group (347T). I did my PhD on Probabilistic Visual Odometry using RGB-D and Geometric primitives for Man-made Environments. I am particularly interested in modelling uncertainty and using multiple view geometry, deep learning and computer graphics to solve computer vision problems.
